A gamble for wit. Unless you really need the extra wit, its usually not worth it.

In Champion's Meeting, there are only 9 horses while blocks will always be capped at 8. Due to allocation mechanics, 4 horses will be in gate block 6 - 8. In other words, you have a 4/9 chance of triggering this condition. Decent odds for gambling if you have extra skill points.

conditions: No other uma using the same strategy
review: Very unlikely for no other Uma to not use your strategy.

conditions: 40% of runners or more using the same strategy (4 or more in CM, 5 in TT)
review: Unlikely to trigger for miniscule gains.

conditions: When using the same strategy as the favorite
review: Gambling condition for guts. Not worth.
Favorites are an inconsistent factor to gamble on
Easy to trigger. Consistent source of points for TT. Might be a bit too pricy for what it does in CM.
Easy to trigger for Team Trials but accelerating on the first corner is not very useful.
Consistent and effective recovery that triggers on the first corner.
Easy to trigger. Consistent source of points for TT. On CMs with long straights, might be really helpful.
Easy to trigger for Team Trials but accelerating randomly is not very impactful. An okay gambling skill if cheap and on tracks with few straights.
It might trigger on an early or late activation, largely reducing the impact of the stamina recovery.

description: Improved start reaction time by 0.9x, decreasing chance of a late start.
review: By starting well and placing well, your score in TT can be boosted. For CM, only worth taking for Front Runners. Can also wotk to trigger Groundwork.

conditions: Blocked in front for 1s or more
After at least 5s into a race
review: Might trigger during the early race, wasting the stamina recovery.

description: Increases lane movement speed by 0.035 for 3.0s.
review: Combined with Dodging Danger lets a Front Runner zoom early race. Do not upgrade if using the combo.
Consistent velocity skill. Really useful when combined with Tail Held High, Slipstream and Playtime's Over!
Being overtaken is not an ideal condition.
Unlikely to be boxed in completely for 1s, especially in CM where there are only 9 runners.

description: Increases acceleration by 0.2 and lane movement speed by 0.005 for 3.0s.
conditions: Behind another uma with at most 1 Length gap for 1s or more
review: Does not need to be blocked now, only behind an uma, making this skill much easier to trigger. Alongside with the lane movement buffs, becomes a strong acceleration if triggered.

description: Increases lane movement speed by 0.025 for 3.0s.
review: Doesn't do much. Take if cheap and no other options.
Useful additional speed at the final spurt of the race. Might trigger too late and be less effective.
A necessary skill to have on Front Runners. Can now trigger Groundwork.

conditions: 50% or better (5th or better in CM, 6th or better in TT)
review: Helps front runners maintain/regain their lead during the mid race.
Being first is not a consistent condition. Skill is however conditionally useful on specific tracks.

conditions: 50% or better (5th or better in CM, 6th or better in TT)
review: Triggering at the second half of the early race is less likely to overflow, so the skill is now more usable.

conditions: 50% or better (5th or better in CM, 6th or better in TT)
review: Good and consistent recovery skill for a pace chaser.

conditions: 50% or better (5th or better in CM, 6th or better in TT)
review: An okay speed boost for a pace chaser. Might not be beneficial depending on the final corner/ last spurt mode.

conditions: 50% or worse (6th or worse in CM, 7th or worse in TT)
review: Consistent effect. Can help Late Surgers move up to trigger dueling mechanics with Pace Chasers.

conditions: 50% or worse (6th or worse in CM, 7th or worse in TT)
review: Gambling acceleration skill for late surgers. Might be ineffective if not triggering at the right moment.

conditions: Overtaking an uma that is closer to the inner fence than you
review: An okay speed boost for a Late Surger. Might not be beneficial depending on the final corner/ last spurt mode.
A well built end closer may be above the last 25% of the pack preventing this skill from triggering.
Very strong acceleration skill for an End Closer on tracks where last spurt begins on a straight. Take in appropriate CM.
Easy to trigger for Team Trials but accelerating randomly is not very impactful. An okay gambling skill if cheap and on tracks with few straights.

conditions: 50% or worse (6th or worse in CM, 7th or worse in TT)

conditions: 50% or worse (6th or worse in CM, 7th or worse in TT)

Somewhat consistent recovery for Front Runners. Gambling on Pace Chasers.

conditions: 50% or better (5th or better in CM, 6th or better in TT)

Useful on tracks where the final corner is right before last spurt mode. Take for the appropriate CMs.

description: Increases lane movement speed by 0.025 and acceleration by 0.2 for 4.0s.
review: Mid race lane movement speed and mid-race acceleration is a gamble. Works if it triggers before the late race, otherwise kinda useless. Take only if its really cheap and you have no other options.

description: Reduces speed by 0.2 for 3.0s for all umas behind.

review: Strong speed debuff skill. Might not activate due to 5s buffer time.

review: Mid race speed boost can help break Pace Down mechanics and put you in a better position for late race zooming.
Mid-race acceleration is not very impactful.

conditions: After at least 5s into a race
review: Cheap and consistent skill. With optimal timing, and other skills triggering, can help you zoom.

description: Reduces speed by 0.15 for 3.0s to 5 umas behind you and increases your speed by 0.15 for 3.0s.
review: Debuffs your enemies and increases your speed as a Front Runner. Pretty decent.

description: Reduces acceleration by 0.1 for 3.0s to all umas ahead.
conditions: 50% or worse (6th or worse in CM, 7th or worse in TT)
After at least 3s into a race
review: Reducing the Front Runners acceleration at the start of the race may be impactful, but the 3s buffer makes triggering it inconsistent.

review: Mid race lane movement speed and mid-race acceleration is a gamble. Works if it triggers before the late race, otherwise kinda useless. Take only if its really cheap and you have no other options.

conditions: After at least 10s into a race
review: Okay recovery. Upgraded is worse as it can overflow during the early race.

description: Reduces speed by 0.15 for 3.0s to all umas ahead.
conditions: 50% or worse (6th or worse in CM, 7th or worse in TT)
review: Very impacful speed debuff, as it occurs during the late-race. Only suitable for late surgers and end closers.

description: Reduces HP by 1% for all umas ahead.
conditions: Blocked in front for 1s or more
review: Consistent debuff that can cripple front runners and pace chasers. Most suitable for late surgers and end closers.
Cheap, easy to trigger. Good value. For TT, only take one level. For CM, take 2 if affordable.
Cheap, easy to trigger. Good value. For TT, only take one level. For CM, take 2 if affordable.

conditions: After at least 5s into a race
review: May trigger early race diminishing its value.

Overtake tends to happen at the beginning of the last spurt mode, where acceleration skills are triggering. During this phase, you are unlikely to be at top speed yet, rendering this skill to be useless.

description: Reduces HP by 0.5% to 5 umas ahead of you and recovers your HP by 1.5%.
review: Stamina recovery + stamina debuff is a pretty good skill for CM.

description: Reduces FoV by 5 for 3.0s for all umas ahead.
review: FoV is a useless stat to debuff. May help against umas that require FoV such as Nice Nature debuff build.
Cheap, easy to trigger. Good value. For TT, only take one level. For CM, take 2 if affordable.
Cheap, easy to trigger. Good value. For TT, only take one level. For CM, take 2 if affordable.

description: Increases lane movement speed by 0.025 for 3.0s.
conditions: Blocked in any direction for 1s or more
review: Combined with Prudent Positioning / Ignition Spirit WIT lets a Front Runner zoom early race. Do not upgrade if using the combo.

conditions: Be overtaken OR blocked from the side
After at least 5s into a race
review: Helps a Front Runner retake or contest the lead during the early - mid race. Works more consistently the longer the track.

conditions: After at least 10s into a race
review: Map based skill. Useful when the uphill is in the middle of the race.
Mid race acceleration is not great. Unlikely to catch up to the actual front with this.

description: Reduces acceleration by 0.1 for 3.0s to all umas ahead.
conditions: After at least 5s into a race
review: Might not trigger at the right moment due to the 5s buffer.

Cheap, easy to trigger. Good value. For TT, only take one level. For CM, take 2 if affordable.

Very impactful on tracks where the downhill is right before the last spurt.

review: Mid race acceleration is not very impactful. An okay filler for TT points.

review: Extra FoV is not very impactful unless you need for extra debuff range.

review: Limited by your FoV, which may not impact consistently.

Consistent activation, but most effective on tracks shorter than 2400m.
Very impactful on tracks where the uphill is right before the last spurt.

conditions: 3 or more umas within 3 meters and/or 3 lanes
After at least 5s into a race
review: Can break through PDM on some tracks. Consider taking mid race speed skills as well to continuously break PDM.
Front Runners only. Take green skills suited for the CM youre building for and other early race skills such as Focus/Concentration, Early Lead, etc.
Cheap and consistent. Use together with skills like Ramp Up, Slipstream and other mid-race skills.

conditions: Activate 3 skills late race or later
4 other umas have the same skill
review: Requires another player to also have sympathy which is unlikely and not beneficial.

conditions: No other umas with the same skill
review: Either you trigger it and gain a cheap speed stat buff, or you prevent your enemy from triggering it. Only have 1 per team.

conditions: Behind another uma for 3s or more
After at least 10s into a race
review: Helps you in overtaking. Works well with Ramp Up and Tail Held High.

conditions: Ahead of another uma for 3s or more
After at least 10s into a race
review: Helps preventing you from getting overtaken.

conditions: Blocked from sides for 2s or more
review: Helpful skill to maintain/secure the lead on dirt tracks.

description: Increases speed based on your team's total base speed stat for 1.8s, increasing by 0.12 when below 1200, 0.135 at 1200 - 1799, 0.15 at 1800 - 2599, 0.165 at 2600 - 3599, and 0.18 if 3600 or higher.
review: A bit costly, but can help when combined with other mid race speed skills.

description: Recover HP based on your team's total base stamina stat, increasing by 1.2% when below 1200, 1.35% at 1200 - 1799, 1.5% at 1800 - 2599, 1.65% at 2600 - 3599, and 1.8% if 3600 or higher.
review: A bit costly without hints.

description: Increases acceleration based on your team's total base power stat for 1.2s, increasing by 0.16 when below 1200, 0.18 at 1200 - 1799, 0.2 at 1800 - 2599, 0.22 at 2600 - 3599, and 0.24 if 3600 or higher.
review: A bit costly, but is a late race acceleration that works on every style.

description: Increases speed and acceleration based on your team's total base guts stat for 1.8s, increasing by 0.04 and 0.1 when below 1200, 0.045 and 0.09 at 1200 - 1799, 0.05 and 0.1 at 1800 - 2599, 0.055 and 0.11 at 2600 - 3599, and 0.06 and 0.2 if 3600 or higher.
review: Unless youre running 3 Guts build aces, its unlikely for you to hit the highest guts threshold.

description: Increases lane movement speed and FoV based on your team's total base wit stat for 3.0s, increasing by 0.012 and 4 when below 1200, 0.0135 and 4.5 at 1200 - 1799, 0.015 and 5 at 1800 - 2599, 0.0165 and 5.5 at 2600 - 3599, and 0.018 and 6 if 3600 or higher.
review: Combine with Dodging Danger on a Front Runner to zoom early. Do not upgrade to Burning Spirit WIT if so.
Easy to trigger. Consistent source of points for TT. Might be a bit too pricy for what it does in CM.

description: Reduces HP by 3% for all umas ahead.
conditions: Blocked in front for 1s or more
review: Consistent debuff that can cripple front runners and pace chasers. Most suitable for late surgers and end closers.

conditions: After at least 5s into a race
review: May trigger early race diminishing its value.

Overtake tends to happen at the beginning of the last spurt mode, where acceleration skills are triggering. During this phase, you are unlikely to be at top speed yet, rendering this skill to be useless.

description: Reduces HP by 1% to 5 umas ahead of you and recovers your HP by 3.5%.
review: Stamina recovery + stamina debuff is a pretty good skill for CM.

description: Reduces FoV by 10 for 3.0s for all umas ahead.
review: FoV is a useless stat to debuff. May help against umas that require FoV such as Nice Nature debuff build.

description: Increases lane movement speed by 0.035 for 3.0s.
conditions: Blocked in any direction for 1s or more
review: The speed from Sixth Sense is higher than Dodging Danger and instead bricks the combo with Prudent Positioning. If you're looking to do the Dodging Danger strat, avoid upgrading this skill.

conditions: Be overtaken OR blocked from the side
After at least 5s into a race
review: Helps a Front Runner retake or contest the lead during the early - mid race. Works more consistently the longer the track.

conditions: After at least 10s into a race
review: Map based skill. Useful when the uphill is in the middle of the race.
Mid race acceleration is not great. Unlikely to catch up to the actual front with this.
Easy to trigger for Team Trials. However this will likely trigger mid-race where acceleration is not impactful.
Very impactful on tracks where the downhill is right before the last spurt.
Good and consistent recovery skill for a Pace Chaser.

conditions: 40% or worse (5th or worse in CM, 6th or worse in TT)
review: Mid race acceleration is not very impactful. An okay filler for TT points.

description: Reduces FoV by 5 for 3.0s for all umas behind you.
conditions: 50% or better (5th or better in CM, 6th or better in TT)
review: FoV is a useless stat to debuff. May help against umas that require FoV such as Nice Nature debuff build.

conditions: After at least 5s into a race
review: Mid-race acceleration is not very impactful.
Cheap and consistent. Good for maps with uphills.
Extra FoV is not very impactful unless you need for extra debuff range.

description: Reduces HP by 3% for all umas within PoV.
conditions: 50% or worse (6th or worse in CM, 7th or worse in TT)
review: Strong stamina debuff.
Extra FoV is not very impactful unless you need for extra debuff range.
aliases: 視界良好 異常なし
downgrade: I Can See Right Through You

conditions: After at least 10s into a race
review: Map based skill. Useful when the downhill is in the middle of the race.
aliases: 下校後のスペシャリスト

conditions: Blocked in front for 1s or more
After at least 10s into a race
50% or worse (6th or worse in CM, 7th or worse in TT)
review: Extra FoV is not very impactful unless you need for extra debuff range.

description: Reduces speed by 0.25 for 3.0s to all umas within FoV.
review: Limited by your FoV, which may not impact consistently.

description: Increases speed, stamina and power stat by 60
review: Relying on being in bracket 7 is a big gamble. It also comes with a coinflip of activating even if you're in bracket 7.

conditions: 3 or more umas within 3 meters and/or 3 lanes
After at least 5s into a race
review: Can break through PDM on some tracks. Consider taking mid race speed skills as well to continuously break PDM.
Front Runners only. Take green skills suited for the CM youre building for and other early race skills such as Focus/Concentration, Early Lead, etc.
Cheap and consistent. Use together with skills like Ramp Up, Slipstream and other mid-race skills.

description: Speed stat +60. Activates all sympathy skills.

conditions: Behind another uma for 3s or more
After at least 10s into a race
review: Helps you in overtaking. Works well with Ramp Up and Tail Held High.

conditions: Ahead of another uma for 3s or more
After at least 10s into a race
review: Helps preventing you from getting overtaken.

conditions: Blocked from sides for 2s or more
review: Helpful skill to maintain/secure the lead on dirt tracks.

description: Increases speed based on your team's total base speed stat for 1.8s, increasing by 0.28 when below 1200, 0.315 at 1200 - 1799, 0.35 at 1800 - 2599, 0.385 at 2600 - 3599, and 0.42 if 3600 or higher.
review: A bit costly, but can help when combined with other mid race speed skills.

description: Recover HP based on your team's total base stamina stat, increasing by 4.4% when below 1200, 4.95% at 1200 - 1799, 5.5% at 1800 - 2599, 6.05% at 2600 - 3599, and 6.6% if 3600 or higher.
review: A bit costly without hints.

description: Increases acceleration based on your team's total base power stat for 1.2s, increasing by 0.32 when below 1200, 0.36 at 1200 - 1799, 0.4 at 1800 - 2599, 0.44 at 2600 - 3599, and 0.48 if 3600 or higher.
review: A bit costly, but is a late race acceleration that works on every style.

description: Increases speed and acceleration based on your team's total base guts stat for 1.8s, increasing by 0.2 and 0.24 when below 1200, 0.225 and 0.27 at 1200 - 1799, 0.25 and 0.3 at 1800 - 2599, 0.275 and 0.33 at 2600 - 3599, and 0.3 and 0.36 if 3600 or higher.
review: Unless youre running 3 Guts build aces, its unlikely for you to hit the highest guts threshold.

description: Increases lane movement speed and FoV based on your team's total base wit stat for 3.0s, increasing by 0.028 and 12 when below 1200, 0.0315 and 13.5 at 1200 - 1799, 0.035 and 15 at 1800 - 2599, 0.0385 and 16.5 at 2600 - 3599, and 0.042 and 18 if 3600 or higher.
review: The speed from Burning Spirit WIT is higher than Ignited Spirit WIT and instead bricks the combo with Dodging Danger. If you're looking to do the Dodging Danger strat, avoid upgrading this skill

conditions: Racecourse length is a multiple of 400m
Racecourse length is not a multiple of 400m
Track condition is good, soft or heavy
40% of runners or more using the same strategy (4 or more in CM, 5 in TT)
Major races (G1, EX, CM, TT, etc)
After at least 2s into a race

description: Worsen start reaction time by 1.5x, increasing chance of a late start.
review: May take to reduce score when building a B grade CM horse.

conditions: After at least 2s into a race

description: Increases speed by 0.35 for 5.0s when 1st to 5th place, has an overtake target for at least 2s and on the last straight.
inherited: Increases speed by 0.15 for 3.0s when 1st to 5th place, has an overtake target for at least 2s and on the last straight.
review: Non front runners only. Decent skill.

description: Increases speed by 0.35 for 5.0s when 1st to 3rd place, be an overtake target for at least 1s, on the final corner and beyond, less than 1 length ahead of the uma behind and having less than 35% HP remaining.
inherited: Increases speed by 0.15 for 3.0s when 1st to 3rd place, be an overtake target for at least 1s, on the final corner and beyond, less than 1 length ahead of the uma behind and having less than 35% HP remaining.
review: So much conditions, won't actually trigger most of the time.

description: Increases speed by 0.35 for 5.0s when overtaking, if first half of the pack but not first, during the late-race.
inherited: Increases speed by 0.15 for 3.0s when overtaking, if first half of the pack but not first, during the late-race.
review: Easy to trigger but isn't very strong.

skill_name: The View from the Lead is Mine!
description: Increases speed by 0.35 for 5.0s when in first place, with a lead greater than 1 length on the last straight.
inherited: Increases speed by 0.15 for 3.0s when in first place, with a lead greater than 1 length on the last straight.
review: Easy to trigger for front runners but isn't very strong.

description: Increases speed by 0.45 for 5.0s when 1st to 3rd place, has an overtake target, less than 1 length behind from the uma ahead and on the last straight.
inherited: Increases speed by 0.25 for 3.0s when 1st to 3rd place, has an overtake target, less than 1 length behind from the uma ahead and on the last straight.
review: Non front runners only. Decently strong skill.

description: Increases speed by 0.45 for 5.0s when 2nd to 5th place, 200m before race ends.
inherited: Increases speed by 0.25 for 3.0s when 2nd to 5th place, 200m before race ends.
review: Non front runners only. Consistent and strong skill.

description: Increases speed by 0.25 for 6.0s when last half of the pack between 50% to 60% of the race.
inherited: Increases speed by 0.05 for 3.6s when last half of the pack between 50% to 60% of the race.
review: Easy to trigger for late surgers and end closers but the speed increase is too low.

description: Increases speed by 0.15 for 6.0s when last half of the pack between 50% to 60% of the race.
review: You can't inherit this.

description: Increases speed by 0.35 for 5.0s when first half of the pack, but not 1st or 2nd, less than 200m before race ends and less than 1 length away from the uma in front and behind.
inherited: Increases speed by 0.15 for 3.0s when first half of the pack, but not 1st or 2nd, less than 200m before race ends and less than 1 length away from the uma in front and behind.
review: Too many conditions for a very mediocre effect.

description: Increases speed by 0.25 for 5.0s when first half of the pack, but not 1st or 2nd, less than 200m before race ends and less than 1 length away from the uma in front and behind.
review: You can't inherit this.

description: Increases speed by 0.25 and acceleration by 0.3 for 5.0s when 1st place, greater than 1 length away from the uma behind and in the second half of the race.
inherited: Increases speed by 0.05 and acceleration by 0.1 for 3.0s when 1st place, greater than 1 length away from the uma behind and in the second half of the race.
review: Better on Front Runners. Skill triggers easily but may not trigger at the right moments due to the second half of the race condition.

description: Increases speed by 0.15 and acceleration by 0.2 for 5.0s when 1st place, greater than 1 length away from the uma behind and in the second half of the race.
review: You can't inherit this.

skill_name: Where There's a Will, There's a Way
description: Increases speed by 0.35 for 5.0s when overtaking, greater than 4th place on the last straight.
inherited: Increases speed by 0.15 for 3.0s when overtaking, greater than 4th place on the last straight.
review: Overtaking and still being 4th place during the last straight is probably not gonna make you win.
aliases: where theres a will theres a way

description: Increases speed by 0.25 for 5.0s when overtaking, greater than 4th place on the last straight.
review: You can't inherit this.
upgrade: Where There's a Will, There's a Way

description: Increases speed by 0.35 for 5.0s if first 30% of the pack (by distance) on the final corner.
inherited: Increases speed by 0.15 for 3.0s if first 30% of the pack (by distance) on the final corner.
review: Final corner is map dependant. Increasing target speed on final corner may not be helpful. Might be useful for Front Runners and Pace Chasers.

description: Increases speed by 0.25 and acceleration by 0.3 for 5.0s when 1st or 2nd place, with more than 30% HP remaining, on the last straight.
inherited: Increases speed by 0.05 and acceleration by 0.1 for 3.0s when 1st or 2nd place, with more than 30% HP remaining, on the last straight.
review: Having greater than 30% stamina on the final straight is map dependant. On shorter maps with a long final straight, 30% HP is reachable and since this skill works on 2nd place, it can be useful for Front Runners to contest the blockers.

description: Increases speed by 0.15 and acceleration by 0.2 for 5.0s when 1st or 2nd place, with more than 30% HP remaining, on the last straight.
review: You can't inherit this.

description: Increases speed by 0.35 for 5.0s if 1st to 4th place, blocked on the sides for more than 2s, less than 1 length away from the uma in front and behind and on the final corner.
inherited: Increases speed by 0.15 for 3.0s if 1st to 4th place, blocked on the sides for more than 2s, less than 1 length away from the uma in front and behind and on the final corner.
review: Final corner is map dependant. Increasing target speed on final corner may not be helpful. Way too many conditions to trigger consistently.

description: Increases speed by 0.45 for 5.0s on the last straight if you have already overtaken at least 3 umas since the late-race phase.
inherited: Increases speed by 0.25 for 3.0s on the last straight if you have already overtaken at least 3 umas since the late-race phase.
review: Strong effect with a somewhat easy condition to trigger on Late Surgers and End Closers. Might struggle to trigger on Pace Chasers in Champion's Meet depending on the meta.

description: Increases speed by 0.35 for 5.0s when overtaking, greater than 4th place on the final corner.
inherited: Increases speed by 0.15 for 3.0s when overtaking, greater than 4th place on the final corner.
review: Final corner is map dependant. Increasing target speed on final corner may not be helpful. Might be useful for Late Surgers.

description: Increases speed by 0.25 for 5.0s when overtaking, greater than 4th place on the final corner.
review: You can't inherit this.

description: Increases speed by 0.35 for 5.0s when overtaking, between 1st to 4th place, on the final corner.
inherited: Increases speed by 0.15 for 3.0s when overtaking, between 1st to 4th place, on the final corner.
review: Final corner is map dependant. Increasing target speed on final corner may not be helpful. Might be useful for Front Runners.

description: Increases speed by 0.25 and acceleration by 0.3 for 5.0s when 1st to 3rd place, blocked on the sides for more than 2s, and on the final corner.
inherited: Increases speed by 0.05 and acceleration by 0.1 for 3.0s when 1st to 3rd place, blocked on the sides for more than 2s, and on the final corner.
review: Better on Front Runners and Pace Chasers. Acceleration on the final corner is super impactful on specific maps, otherwise avoid. Check umalator if skill is good on the map before deciding.

description: Increases speed by 0.35 for 5.0s when 1st to 3rd place, no late start and never rushed, on the last straight.
inherited: Increases speed by 0.15 for 3.0s when 1st to 3rd place, no late start and never rushed, on the last straight.
review: Effects are weak. Late Start or Rushed may happen and kill your race if you are relying on this skill.

description: Increases speed by 0.35 for 5.0s when overtaking, between 1st to 4th place, on the last straight.
inherited: Increases speed by 0.15 for 3.0s when overtaking, between 1st to 4th place, on the last straight.
review: Easy to trigger. Effects are rather weak.

description: Increases speed by 0.35 for 5.0s when 1st to 5th place, blocked on the sides for more than 2s, and on the last straight.
inherited: Increases speed by 0.15 for 3.0s when 1st to 5th place, blocked on the sides for more than 2s, and on the last straight.
review: Unlikely to be blocked on the sides on the last straight in Champion's Meet. Effects are also rather weak.

description: Increases speed by 0.25 for 5.0s when 1st to 5th place, blocked on the sides for more than 2s, and on the last straight.
review: You can't inherit this.

description: Increases speed by 0.35 for 5.0s when 1st to 3rd place, blocked on the sides for more than 2s, and in second half of the race.
inherited: Increases speed by 0.15 for 3.0s when 1st to 3rd place, blocked on the sides for more than 2s, and in second half of the race.
review: Better on Front Runners. Skill triggers easily but may not trigger at the right moments due to the second half of the race condition. Effects are also rather weak.

description: Increases speed by 0.25 for 5.0s when 1st to 3rd place, blocked on the sides for more than 2s, and in second half of the race.
review: You can't inherit this.

skill_name: I See Victory in My Future!
description: Increases speed by 0.35 for 5.0s when 3rd place or greater, blocked in front and in the late-race.
inherited: Increases speed by 0.15 for 3.0s when 3rd place or greater, blocked in front and in the late-race.
review: Weak effects alongside a front blocked condition is bad.
aliases: i see victory in my future

description: Increases speed by 0.25 for 5.0s when 3rd place or greater, blocked in front and in the late-race.
review: You can't inherit this.
upgrade: I See Victory in My Future!

description: Increases speed by 0.35 for 5.0s when in 3rd place, less than 1 length away from uma behind, and in the late-race.
inherited: Increases speed by 0.15 for 3.0s when in 3rd place, less than 1 length away from uma behind, and in the late-race.
review: Easy to trigger but isn't very strong.

description: Increases speed by 0.25 for 5.0s when in 3rd place, less than 1 length away from uma behind, and in the late-race.
review: You can't inherit this.

description: Increases speed by 0.45 for 5.0s when in 5th place (for Champion's Meet) or 5th to 7th place (for Team Trials), did not get rushed and is 200m away from the race end.
inherited: Increases speed by 0.25 for 3.0s when in 5th place (for Champion's Meet) or 5th to 7th place (for Team Trials), did not get rushed and is 200m away from the race end.
review: A bit similar to Oguri Cap (Original)'s skill. Much more difficult to trigger. Avoid if possible.

description: Increases speed by 0.35 for 5.0s when in 5th place (for Champion's Meet) or 5th to 7th place (for Team Trials), did not get rushed and is 200m away from the race end.
review: You can't inherit this.

description: Increases speed by 0.25 and acceleration by 0.3 for 5.0s when overtaking, if top 40% of the pack but not 1st or 2nd, between 50% to 65% of the race (by distance).
inherited: Increases speed by 0.05 and acceleration by 0.1 for 3.0s when overtaking, if top 40% of the pack but not 1st or 2nd, between 50% to 65% of the race (by distance).
review: Easy to trigger but the effect will occur in the mid-race, which isn't critical for winning.

description: Increases speed by 0.35 for 5.0s when overtake target exists, between 50% to 75% of the pack on the final corner.
inherited: Increases speed by 0.15 for 3.0s when overtake target exists, between 50% to 75% of the pack on the final corner.
review: Easy to trigger for Late Surgers and End Closers but weak effect.

description: Increases speed by 0.25 and acceleration by 0.3 for 5.0s when 1st place, lesser than 1 length ahead of the uma behind, on a straight during the mid-race.
inherited: Increases speed by 0.05 and acceleration by 0.1 for 3.0s when 1st place, lesser than 1 length ahead of the uma behind, on a straight during the mid-race.
review: Helps Front Runners maintain their lead.

description: Increases speed by 0.35 for 5.0s first 75% of the pack but not 1st place, with an overtake target uma closer to the fence than yours, on the final corner and beyond.
inherited: Increases speed by 0.15 for 3.0s first 75% of the pack but not 1st place, with an overtake target uma closer to the fence than yours, on the final corner and beyond.
review: Conditions are okay, not too difficult, but the effects are weak.

description:
Increases speed by 0.35 for 5.0s when overtaking, if first 40% of the pack, on the final corner.
 Increases acceleration by 0.4 for 4.0s when overtaking, if between 50% to 80% of the pack, on the final corner.
inherited:
Increases speed by 0.15 for 3.0s when overtaking, if first 40% of the pack, on the final corner.
 Increases acceleration by 0.2 for 2.4s when overtaking, if between 50% to 80% of the pack, on the final corner.
review: Flexible skill that can trigger speed boost for Front Runners and Pace Chasers or acceleration boost for Late Surgers and End Closers. Speed effect is viable on tracks with speed carry over into the final corner (check umalator). Acceleration is good on tracks where the Last Spurt is on the final corner (also check umalator).

description: Increases speed by 0.35 for 5.0s when first half of the pack but not 1st or 2nd, has an overtake target and during the mid-race.
inherited: Increases speed by 0.15 for 3.0s when first half of the pack but not 1st or 2nd, has an overtake target and during the mid-race.
review: Based on the stats, the effects are weak when inherited. Mid-race speed boost may help your Pace Chaser catch up to other umas before the last spurt, triggering skills with overtake conditions if available.

description: Increases speed by 0.35 for 5.0s for the final straight when overtaking and the uma behind is you closer to the inner fence, while being in the last 60% of the pack (4th place or higher for Champion's Meet, 5th place or higher for Team Trials) in the final corner and beyond.
inherited: Increases speed by 0.15 for 3.0s for the final straight when overtaking and the uma behind is you closer to the inner fence, while being in the last 60% of the pack (4th place or higher for Champion's Meet, 5th place or higher for Team Trials) in the final corner and beyond.
review: Not consistent enough to trigger. Depending on the track, the last 60% of the pack condition may be hard to meet on the final straight.
aliases: you and me one on one

description: Increases speed by 0.45 for 5.0s if first 30% of the pack (1st to 3rd place for Champ's Meet or 1st to 4th place in Team Trials) followed directly by another uma for more than 1s on the final straight.
inherited: Increases speed by 0.25 for 3.0s if first 30% of the pack (1st to 3rd place for Champ's Meet or 1st to 4th place in Team Trials) followed directly by another uma for more than 1s on the final straight.
review: Similar to Oguri Cap (Original)'s skill but works on Front Runners as well.

description: Increases speed by 0.35 for 5s if 1st to 3rd place in the second half of the race when recovering stamina with a skill.
inherited: Increases speed by 0.15 for 5s if 1st to 3rd place in the second half of the race when recovering stamina with a skill.
review: Very easy to trigger, but the numbers are a bit low. Will update later.

description: Increases speed by 0.25 and acceleration by 0.3 for 5.0s when overtaking during the late-race.
inherited: Increases speed by 0.05 and acceleration by 0.1 for 3.0s when overtaking during the late-race.

description: Condition 1 - Increases speed by 0.45 for 5.0s. Condition 2 - Increases speed by 0.35 for 5.0s.
inherited: Condition 1 - Increases speed by 0.25 for 3.0s. Condition 2 - Increases speed by 0.15 for 3.0s.
conditions: 40% or worse the entire race (4th or worse in CM, 5th or worse in TT)
80% or better the entire race (7th or better in CM, 10th or better in TT)
review: Conditions are rather awkward. Numberswise, pretty good.

inherited: Increases acceleration by 0.2 for 2.4s.
review: Very powerful acceleration skill on tracks where the Last Spurt is on or slightly before the final corner. Please consult umalator to check if the skill is effective on the track you are building for.

inherited: Increases acceleration by 0.2 for 2.4s.
review: Very powerful acceleration skill on tracks where the Last Spurt is on or slightly before the final corner. Please consult umalator to check if the skill is effective on the track you are building for.

inherited: Increases acceleration by 0.2 for 2.4s.
review: Powerful acceleration skill. Slightly hard to activate consistently since you need to be 6th on the corner. Best on Late Surgers and End Closers. Please consult umalator to check if the skill is effective on the track you are building for.
You can't inherit this.

inherited: Increases acceleration by 0.2 for 2.4s.
review: Must have skill for all Front Runners. Need to be leading to trigger, so weaker Front Runners will not be able to trigger this. Best on tracks where the spurt begins on a corner. Please consult umalator to check if the skill is effective on the track you are building for.

inherited: Increases acceleration by 0.2 for 2.4s.
review: If the last spurt is on the final corner and you can overtake, this skill is pretty good on Late Surgers and End Closers. Please consult umalator to check if the skill is effective on the track you are building for.

inherited: Increases acceleration by 0.1 for 3.6s.
review: Numbers seem very low for inherit.
